Verses: 1 saalomon Jebampanni Mudikkirapodhu, Akkini Vaanaththilirundhu Irangi, Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaiyum Matrap Paligalaiyum Patchiththadhu; Karththarudaiyamagimaiyum Aalayaththai Nirappitru.
2 karththarudaiya Magimai Karththarudaiya Aalayaththai Nirappinadhinaal, Aasaariyargal Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkul Pravesikkak Koodaadhirundhadhu.

3 akkini Irangugiradhaiyum, Karththarudaiya Magimai Aalayaththinmel Thangiyirukkiradhaiyum, Isravel Puththirar Ellaarum Kandapodhu, Thalavarisaimattum Tharaiyile Mugankuppurak Kunindhupanindhu, Karththar Nallavar, Avarudaiya Kirubai Endrumulladhu Endru Solli, Avaraith Thudhiththaargal.
4 appozhudhu Raajaavum Sagala Janangalum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Paligalai Seluththinaargal.

5 raajaavaagiya Saalomon Irubaththeeraayiram Maadugalaiyum, Latchaththirubadhinaayiram Aadugalaiyum Paliyittaan; Ivvidhamaai Raajaavum Sagala Janangalum Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththaip Pradhishtaipanninaargal.

6 aasaariyargal Thangal Panividaigalai Seydhu Nindraargal; Dhaaveedhuraajaa Leviyaraikkondu, Karththarudaiya Kirubai Endrumulladhu Endru Avaraith Thudhiththuppaadumpadiyaaga Seyviththa Karththarin Keedhavaaththiyangalai Avargalum Vaasiththu Seviththu Nindraargal; Aasaariyargal Avargalukku Edhiraaga Nindru Poorigaigalai Oodhinaargal; Isravelar Ellaarum Nindrukondirundhaargal.

7 saalomon Undaakkina Vengalappalipeedam Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Pojana Paligalaiyum Ninaththaiyum Kollamaattaadhirundhapadiyinaal,karththarudaiya Aalayaththukku Munnirukkira Praagaaraththin Nadumaiyaththai Saalomon Parisuththappaduththi, Ange Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Samaadhaanapaligalin Ninaththaiyum Seluththinaan.
8 akkaalaththildhaane Saalomonum Aamaaththin Ellaiyilirundhu Egipthin Nadhimattum Vandhu, Avanodekooda Irundha Magaa Periya Koottamaagiya Isravel Anaiththum Ezhunaalalavum Pandigaiyai Aasariththu,
9 ettaamnaalai Viseshiththa Aasarippunaalaaik Kondaadinaargal; Ezhunaal Palipeedaththup Pradhishtaiyaiyum, Ezhunaal Pandigaiyaiyum Aasariththaargal.

10 ezhaam Maadhaththin Irubaththumoondraam Thedhiyile Thangal Thangal Koodaarangalukkup Poga Janangalukku Vidaikoduththaan; Karththar Dhaaveedhukkum, Saalomonukkum, Thamadhu Janamaagiya Isravelukkum Seydha Nanmaikkaaga Sandhoshamum Manamagizhchchiyumaaip Ponaargal.

11 ivvidhamaai Saalomon Karththarudaiya Aalayaththaiyum Raaja Aramanaiyaiyum Kattith Theerththaan; Karththarudaiya Aalayaththilum Than Aramanaiyilum Saalomon Seyya Manadhaayirundhadhellaam Anugoolamaayitru.
12 karththar Iravile Saalomonukku Dharisanamaagi: Naan Un Vinnappaththaik Kettu, Indha Sthalaththai Enakkup Paliyidum Aalayamaagath Therindhukonden.
13 naan Mazhaiyillaadhapadikku Vaanaththai Adaiththu, Alladhu Dhesaththai Azhikka Vettukkiligalukkuk Kattalaiyittu, Alladhu En Janaththirkulle Kollainoyai Anuppumpodhu,

14 en Naamam Tharikkappatta En Janangal Thangalaith Thaazhththi, Jebampanni, En Mugaththaith Thedi, Thangal Pollaadha Vazhigalaivittuth Thirumbinaal, Appozhudhu Paralogaththilirukkira Naan Kettu, Avargal Paavaththai Manniththu, Avargal Dhesaththukku Shemaththaik Koduppen.
15 indha Sthalaththile Seyyappadum Jebaththirku En Kangal Thirandhavaigalum, En Sevigal Gavanikkiravaigalumaayirukkum.
16 en Naamam Indha Aalayaththil Endrendraikkum Irukkumpadi, Naan Adhaith Therindhukondu Parisuththappaduththinen; En Kangalum En Irudhayamum Ennaalum Inge Irukkum.
17 un Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Nadandhadhupola, Nee Enakku Munbaaga Nadandhu, Naan Unakkuk Karpiththapadiyellaam Seydhu, En Kattalaigalaiyum En Nyaayangalaiyum Kaikkolvaayaanaal,
18 appozhudhu Isravelai Arasaalum Purushan Unakku Illaamarpovadhillai Endru Naan Un Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhode Udanpadikkaipanninapadiye, Un Raajyabaaraththin Singaasanaththai Nilaikkappannuven.
19 neengal Vazhivilagi, Naan Ungalukkumun Vaiththa En Kattalaigalaiyum En Karpanaigalaiyum Vittuppoi, Vere Dhevargalai Seviththu, Avargalaip Panindhukolveergaleyaagil,

20 naan Avargalukkuk Koduththa En Dhesaththil Irundhu Avargalaip Pidungi, En Naamaththirkendru Naan Parisuththappaduththina Indha Aalayaththai En Samugaththinindru Thalli, Adhai Ellaa Janasadhalangalukkullum Pazhamozhiyaagavum Vasaichchollaagavum Vaippen.
21 appozhudhu Unnadhamaayirukkira Indha Aalayaththaik Kadandhupogiravan Evanum Bramiththu Karththar Indha Dhesaththirkum Indha Aalayaththirkum Ippadi Seydhadhu Enna Endru Ketpaan.

22 adharku Avargal: Thangal Pidhaakkalai Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Thangal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraivittu, Vere Dhevargalaip Patrikkondu, Avaigalai Namaskariththu, Seviththapadiyinaal, Karththar Indhath Theengaiyellaam Avargalmel Varappanninaar Endru Solluvaargal Endraar.
